name: Catherine Alvaresse
background: Catherine Alvaresse serves as Head of Documentary Department at France Télévisions. Focus areas: Documentary films, documentary series. Looking for international co-productions with strong French elements.
thematic_priorities: Premium documentary programming with strong cultural relevance
Documentary series exploring complex social issues
Contemporary social issues explored through compelling narratives
Regional documentary programming celebrating French cultural diversity
Science documentaries balancing intellectual rigor with accessibility
Historical documentaries with fresh perspectives and contemporary relevance
Cultural documentaries exploring French and global arts
target_audience: Broad French audiences across France Télévisions family of channels
budget_parameters: Documentary: €150K–€350K per hour (higher for international co-productions); Specialist Factual: €180K–€400K per hour
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Two-page treatment with premise, approach, and narrative structure
Details of secured or potential access
Key talent and production team credentials
additional_info: Ongoing commissioning cycles; submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; encouragement of sustainable production practices; support for projects across French regions.
